text:
It will be very usefull to see the HTTP message in its HTTP format when it's 
being sent to the server. Right now we can see only the request data through 
the "View Results Tree" listner. (I mean like we can see the response the 
original HTTP format)

Thanks in advanced & keep going

Amos.S
creator: amos@netoncourse.com
